View Javadoc
1   package com.test.vendor.mysql;
2   
3   import com.jsql.model.InjectionModel;
4   import com.jsql.model.exception.JSqlException;
5   import com.jsql.view.terminal.SystemOutTerminal;
6   import org.junit.jupiter.api.AfterEach;
7   import org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions;
8   import org.junitpioneer.jupiter.RetryingTest;
9   
10  class MySqlUnionSuiteIT extends ConcreteMySqlSuiteIT {
11      
12      @Override
13      public void setupInjection() throws Exception {
14          InjectionModel model = new InjectionModel();
15          this.injectionModel = model;
16  
17          model.subscribe(new SystemOutTerminal());
18  
19          model.getMediatorUtils().getParameterUtil().initQueryString(
20              "http://localhost:8080/union?tenant=mysql&name="
21          );
22  
23          model
24          .getMediatorUtils()
25          .getPreferencesUtil()
26          .withIsStrategyDnsDisabled(true)
27          .withIsStrategyBlindBitDisabled(true)
28          .withIsStrategyBlindBinDisabled(true)
29          .withIsStrategyTimeDisabled(true);
30  
31          model
32          .getMediatorUtils()
33          .getConnectionUtil()
34          .withMethodInjection(model.getMediatorMethod().getQuery())
35          .withTypeRequest("GET");
36  
37          model.beginInjection();
38      }
39      
40      @Override
41      @RetryingTest(3)
42      public void listDatabases() throws JSqlException {
43          super.listDatabases();
44      }
45      
46      @Override
47      @RetryingTest(3)
48      public void listTables() throws JSqlException {
49          super.listTables();
50      }
51      
52      @Override
53      @RetryingTest(3)
54      public void listColumns() throws JSqlException {
55          super.listColumns();
56      }
57      
58      @Override
59      @RetryingTest(3)
60      public void listValues() throws JSqlException {
61          super.listValues();
62      }
63  
64      @AfterEach
65      void afterEach() {
66          Assertions.assertEquals(
67              this.injectionModel.getMediatorStrategy().getUnion(),
68              this.injectionModel.getMediatorStrategy().getStrategy()
69          );
70      }
71  }
